entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for July 11, 2024

summary.caption: “There! Quick, Larry! Look! … Was I kidding? … That sucker’s longer than the boat!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for July 11, 2024

summary.caption: “You know, Sid, I really like bananas. … I mean, I know that’s not profound or nothin’. … Heck! We all do. … But for me, I think it goes far beyond that.”

summary.caption: “Oh Thorg! The new bird feeder is wonderful!”

summary.caption: Scene from the film Giraffes IV: This time, they’re not just looking for acacia leaves.
